Package words

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractIPA
    This class contains IPA character classifications.
    Emphasis
    This class contains emphasis information for words, as syllable indexes.
    IPAHandler
    This class parses IPA strings to derive syllable breakdowns and emphases.
    Poem
    This class contains a poem, defined as a collection of stanzas with a title.
    Pronunciation
    This class contains pronunciation data divided by part of speech.
    Pronunciation.SubPronunciation
    Contains pronunciation data defined as collections of words.Syllables objects.
    RhymeScheme
    This class encodes a rhyme scheme for a stanza, defined as a line count and an array of integers.
    Stanza
    This class encodes a stanza as a collection of lines, a desired rhyming scheme, and an intended rhyme scheme.
    SubWord
    This class encodes a sub word, i.e.
    SuperWord
    This class encodes a super word, defined as a plaintext spelling, pronunciation data, and collection of SubWords.
    Syllable
    This class encodes a syllable, defined as a nucleus (a vowel or diphthong), and optional onset (the consonants preceding the nucleus) and coda (the consontants after the nucleus) components.
    Token
    This class is a wrapper for SuperWords, so that non-word elements of poems (whitespace, punctuation, etc.) can be included but kept distinct.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    PartOfSpeech
    This enum allows iteration over the parts of speech included in WordsAPI.
